entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -29.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
